hero.headline: Ha-ppiness Is Homemade
hero.subheadline: Bless the food before us,The family beside us,and the love between us
hero.text1: “Good kitchen equipment is expensive, but most items last a lifetime and will pay for themselves over and over again.”

testimonials.name: Geet Bhardwaj
testimonials.feedback: Seems to be good, The gloss is less, tone is lighter than the kansa products available in northern India, may be because of different additives used. The thalis are thin and light weight, suggest sellers to smoothen the edges of at least baby set items for safety. Thalis bend , they should be thicker than what's been made at present as kansa is brittle. Glasses seem to be machine made but are ok as long as its pure kansa.

testimonials.name: Shamita Pandit
testimonials.feedback: Well, eating food is enjoyable and healthy for mind , body due to rejuvenating properties of pure Kansa . The Customer support system is also good as they remove all difficulties in delivery of articles

testimonials.name: Rakhi Kumar
testimonials.feedback: we received the package, it was very carefully packed with lots of respect to the product. its exactly same as the website picture. we love the product thoroughly and we have started using it at home.

pricing.name: Milton Steel Jar
pricing.content: Multipurpose jar to store cookies, snacks, food grains, and dry fruits.
